DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical trial examine effect low high dose conjugate linoleic acid supplement body composition obese human . Individuals body mass index 30 35kg/m2 randomize receive either placebo , 3.2gCLA , 6.4g CLA daily twelve week . Changes body composition , weight , clinical laboratory value compare three group .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Conjugated Linoleic Acid Supplement Body Composition
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty healthy obese adult volunteer enrol randomize either : 1 ) placebo , 2 ) 3.2 g CLA , 3 ) 6.4 g CLA group supplement 12 week . Body fat mass ( BFM ) lean body mass determine DEXA baseline twelve week intervention . In addition , indirect calorimetry perform baseline twelve week measure change energy expenditure . The effect CLA supplementation weight , waist hip measurement , BMI also determine 12 week . Plasma CLA pill count measure indication compliance . Several blood parameter monitor throughout study , five random 24-hour recall survey use monitor dietary intake CLA-rich food , energy , micronutrient antioxidant .
DOC.criteria: BMI 30 35 kg/m2 history chronic disease food allergy intolerances drug therapy diagnose disease lipidlowering use weightlowering medication diet use tobacco product current planned pregnancy use CLA supplement previous 3 month current substance abuse abnormal clinical laboratory value
